name: Future
description:
You play as a soldier in a war between two AI computers, both sides using human and machine to gain world domination. However you are set on making sure neither side wins.

This game was made for Gameboy competition 2021.

Controls

Shoot- B button

Jump- A button

Shield - Control pad down 

Music off- Select

Keyboard

Shoot- X

Jump- Z

Shield- Down key

Music off- Shift
